title: The Golden Sayings of Epictetus - CLIII
author: Unknown
content:
But what says Socrates?—"One man finds pleasure in
improving his land, another his horses. My pleasure lies in
seeing that I myself grow better day by day.”

This complete text of The Golden Sayings of Epictetus is in the public domain.


Also see Epictetus: A Stoic and Socratic Guide to Life
by A. A. Long.


This page has been created by Philipp Lenssen.

Page last updated on April 2003.
